content.question: Do you have your marriage certificate?
content.originalCertificate: This must be your original marriage certificate or a certified copy. You can't use a photocopy.
content.certificateTranslation: If your certificate isn't in English, you'll also need to provide a certified English translation.
content.court: You'll need to send your marriage certificate and other documents to the court, either by uploading a digital photo or scan, or by post.

screenHasMarriageCert.required: Select yes if you have your marriage certificate
screenHasMarriageCert.invalid: Select yes if you have your marriage certificate
